item.title: Nancy Pelosi injured, undergoing medical evaluation in Luxembourg
item.description: Democratic Rep. Nancy Pelosi, 84, was hospitalized while abroad on a congressional delegation, her office said on Friday.

item.title: 'Multiple' drones entered airspace at New Jersey naval station: Official
item.description: There have been "multiple" instances of drones entering the airspace at a Navy weapons station in New Jersey, officials said, as concern continues to ...

item.title: Trump now says bringing down grocery prices, as he promised, will be 'very hard'
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump campaigned relentlessly on grocery prices in the 2024 race. Now, he says lowering costs will be "very hard."

item.title: Russia targets Ukrainian infrastructure with a massive attack of missiles and drones
item.description: Russia has launched a massive aerial attack against Ukraine
